Traits.Name: Engorge
Traits.Description: Increase size by 1 and gains +1 action for the rest of combat if this demon uses Devour on another demon (natals don't count).

Actions.Name: Flesh Hook
Actions.Description: A character in range 4 must pass a save or be shoved towards the demon as much as possible. Instantly recharges and doesn't require a save if used on an ally.
